passive_1: Deal [8%|5%] of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 100 bonus damage against minions and monsters.
Deal [10%|6%] of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 100 bonus damage against minions and monsters.
Deal [9%|6%] of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 100 bonus damage against minions and monsters.
passive_2: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to slow the target by 30% for 1 second (15 second cooldown).
The next basic attack against an enemy champion on-hit  slows them by [30%|15%] for 1 second (15 second cooldown).
Attacking a champion 3 times deals 40 – 103 (based on level) magic damage on-hit and steals 25% of their movement speed for 2 seconds (30 second cooldown).
passive_1: Deal [12%|9%] of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 60 bonus damage against minions and monsters.
Deal [12%|8%] of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 60 bonus damage against minions and monsters.

passive_2: Attacking a champion 3 times deals 40 – 150 (based on level) magic damage on-hit and steals 25% of their movement speed for 2 seconds (20 second cooldown).

passive_1: Deal [10%|6%] of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 60 bonus damage against minions and monsters.
passive_2: Attacking a champion 3 times deals 40 – 120 (based on level) magic damage on-hit and steals 25% of their movement speed for 2 seconds (20 second cooldown).

passive_1: Deals [12%|8%] of the target's current health in bonus physical damage (max 60 damage vs. monsters and minions) on-hit. Minimum 15 damage.

motd:
Bugfix: • No longer causes The Black Cleaver to apply two stacks per basic attack

  • Fixed an interaction where energized attacks prevented some movement speed boosts
Bugfix: On-hit effect no longer applies a stack of The Black Cleaver

passive_1: Deals 8% of the target's current health in bonus physical damage (max 60 damage vs. monsters and minions) on-hit. Minimum 15 damage.
passive_2: Deals 100 magic damage, and steals 25% of the target's movement speed for 3 seconds (90 second cooldown, 550 range).

passive_1: Deals 8% of the target's current health in bonus physical damage (max 60 damage vs. monsters and minions) on-hit. Minimum 10 damage.
Deals 6% of the target's current health in bonus physical damage (max 60 damage vs. monsters and minions) on-hit. Minimum 10 damage.

passive_2: Deals 10% of target champion's maximum health as physical damage (min. 100), heals for the same amount, and steals 25% of the target's movement speed for 3 seconds (90 second cooldown, 550 range).

passive_1: Deals 8% of the target's current health in bonus physical damage (max 60 damage vs. monsters and minions) on-hit. Minimum 10 damage.
motd: Change: Passive damage now benefits from life steal.

passive_1: Deals 8% of the target's current health in bonus physical damage (max 60 damage vs. monsters and minions) on-hit. Minimum 3 damage.
passive_2: Deals 10% of target champion's maximum health as physical damage (min. 100), heals for the same amount, and steals 25% of the target's movement speed for 3 seconds (90 second cooldown, 450 range).

motd: Note: Patch notes claim that active range was reduced from 550.

passive_2: Deals 15% of target champion's maximum health as physical damage (min. 100), heals for the same amount, and steals 30% of the target's movement speed for 3 seconds (90 second cooldown, 500 range).

passive_1: Deals 5% of the target's current health in bonus physical damage (max 60 damage vs. monsters and minions) on-hit. Minimum 3 damage.
motd: Change: Active heal amount is now reduced by target's armor.

passive_1: Deals 5% of the target's current health in bonus physical damage (max 90 damage vs. monsters and minions) on-hit. Minimum 3 damage.
passive_2: Deals 15% of target champion's maximum health as physical damage (min. 100), heals for the same amount, and steals 30% of the target's movement speed for 4 seconds (60 second cooldown, 500 range).

passive_1: Your attacks deal 5% of the target's current health in physical damage and heals you for half the amount (120 max vs. minions).
Your attacks deal 4% of the target's current health in physical damage and heals you for half the amount (120 max vs. minions).
Your attacks deal 4% of the target's current health in magic damage and heals you for half the amount (120 max vs. minions).
passive_2: Drains target champion, dealing 150 physical damage plus 50% of your attack damage and healing you by the same amount. Additionally, you steal 30% of their movement speed for 2 seconds (60 second cooldown, 400 range).
